Scan and save many barcodes continuously
Improves scanning in low light on some phones, but may cause glare. Does not work on all phones.

Store multiple scans of the same barcode in History
Try to retrieve more information about the barcode contents
Recommendations for people to contact based on your message history
- Register now to get full access \n to Ikode SC Reader settings and improved features

•\the terms \"Personal Information\" or \"Personally Identifiable Information\" means your phone number, email address, and/or user ID information that identify you personally as well as unique device identifiers such as IMEI, MEID, IMSI, or ESN. Geo-location (GPS, WiFi) is a user choice/opt-in, though recommended;

• the terms “Personal Information” and "Personally Identifiable Information” do not include name, technical information (for example, Media Access Control “MAC” address, and Internet Protocol or “IP” address), or numbers or alpha-numeric identifiers assigned by us, third-parties, or your computer. We do not access your text messages or email, call logs, contacts/address book, financial and payment information, health and medical information, photos or videos, Web browsing history and/or apps downloaded or used on your mobile device.

Your privacy is important to Ikona and we go to great lengths to protect it. This Privacy Policy applies to the online collection of personal information via the IkodeSC Reader® mobile applications operated by Ikona AG and its worldwide affiliated companies and subsidiaries. This Statement does not apply to information collected in any other way, including offline, through Ikona® and Ikode® Websites, or through other Ikona mobile applications. IkodeSC Reader® is a counter-fraud authenticity versification tool and may contain buttons or links to Ikona\'s Counter-fraud Exchanges or to sites maintained by third party Ikode® clients that offer such authenticity verification for their products, documents or services. Whereas the Ikona Counter-fraud Exchange servers are operated and it\'s appropriate security, third party sites are not operated or controlled by Ikona and may have different privacy practices.

•\tWe collect information about our users in the following ways: directly from the user (when registering with us), from our Counter-fraud Exchange server & application logs every time you start to use the IkodeSC Reader® app for user authentication, as well as when you make changes to the app\'s Settings, for instance:
1.\tA unique user identifier (UUID) we assign to you and visible portrait as a smartcode \tin your Profile and other Activity screens of the IkodeSC Reader® app;
2.\tUnique device identifiers such as IMEI, MEID, IMSI, or ESN, MAC address, or similar identifiers;
Information or text that you enter in the application;
The kind of operating system and mobile device you use, including version number;
5.\tOther technical facts regarding your mobile device;
7.\tThe number of links or buttons you click within the IkodeSC Reader® app;
8.\tThe date and time when you log into your app;
9.\tThe content of the barcode, or smartcode you decode and request an authenticity \tverification, as well as the verification result sent back to you from such a request.

•\tWe use the information, including analytics information, primarily to provide you with mobile application experience that delivers the information, resources, and services that are most relevant and helpful to you and to ensure quality of service, for instance:
1.\tThe name of your Internet service provider;
2.\tOther technical facts regarding your network access;
3.\tThe city, state, and country where you are using the application.
•\tWe do not collect information about our users through cookies and through the use of local storage, including but no limited to local shared objects or \"flash cookies\".
•\tWe do not share your Personal Information, unless we so in this Privacy Policy, or when we believe in good faith that the law requires it.
•\tWe have implemented certain appropriate security measures to help protect your personal information from accidental loss and from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure.
•\tWe store the information about you in our Counter-fraud Exchange data center(s) with restricted access and appropriate monitoring.
•\tWe use intrusion detection and virus protection software.
•\tDespite these measures, we do not guarantee that unauthorized persons will always be unable to defeat our security measures.

• We will not sell, rent, or lease mailing lists or other customer data to others, and we will not make your personal information available to any unaffiliated parties, except our approved agents and contractors, or as otherwise described in this Privacy Policy.

•\tWe rely on some of our affiliates for support of the products and services we offer, and we share some of our back-office functions with other Ikona companies; our affiliates are all required to preserve the confidentiality of any personal information they may access.

•\tWe will not disclose any personal information or information about your usage of mobile applications to unaffiliated third parties, except as necessary to service the account, to enforce the terms of use, to meet our obligations to content and technology providers, or as required by law, in a matter of public safety or policy, as needed in connection with the transfer of our business assets (for example, if we are acquired by another company or if we are liquidated during bankruptcy proceedings), or if we believe in good faith that sharing the data is necessary to protect our rights or property.

Your access to our Counter-fraud Exchange server (automatic when you switch on your Ikode SC Reader app and parts of the apps content (for example changing Settings) are password protected. We avoid unnecessary use of your password to avoid potential man-in-the-middle misuse. However, we also recommend that you refrain from disclosing your username, password and ID Token to anyone. Furthermore, we recommend that you sign out of your IkodeSC Reader application at the end of each session especially if you are using a public WiFi in a public place like airports, train stations, coffee shops, malls and supermarkets or Internet cafes.

•\tYou may cancel your registration (which will return your app Settings to its basic settings and you may no longer access the Settings in the IkodeSC Reader® app) or update your preferences at any time.

•\tCertain unique identifiers used to track usage information of the mobile application will remain the same even after you delete the data associated with the application, or uninstall and reinstall the application. These unique identifiers consist of a number or alpha-numeric string and may be unique to your device, but do NOT contain Personal Information.

•\tIf you opted in for receiving information during registration and decided that you do not want to receive relevant information, please update your account preferences (where available), utilize the \"unsubscribe\" mechanism within the communications that you receive from us.
•\tIf you have any additional questions or concerns related to this policy and/or our practices, email us at privacy@ikodesoftware.com.
